effect.en: If Hitmonlee is on your Bench, this attack does 20 more damage.
effect.fr: Si Kicklee est sur votre Banc, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts supplémentaires.
effect.es: Si Hitmonlee está en tu Banca, este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño más.
effect.it: Se Hitmonlee è nella tua panchina, questo attacco infligge 20 danni in più.
effect.pt: Se Hitmonlee estiver no seu Banco, este ataque causará 20 pontos de dano a mais.
effect.de: Wenn sich Kicklee auf deiner Bank befindet, fügt diese Attacke 20 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

description.en: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
